movie.title: Full Metal Jacket
movie.writer: Gustav Hasford (novel), Stanley Kubrick (screenplay), Michael Herr (screenplay), Gustav Hasford (screenplay)
movie.actors: Matthew Modine, Adam Baldwin, Vincent D'Onofrio, R. Lee Ermey
movie.plot: A two-segment look at the effect of the military mindset and war itself on Vietnam era Marines. The first half follows a group of recruits in boot camp under the command of the punishing Gunnery Sergeant Hartman. The second half shows one of those recruits, Joker, covering the war as a correspondent for Stars and Stripes, focusing on the Tet offensive.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 7 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Intense, tightly constructed, and darkly comic at times, Stanley Kubrick's Full Metal Jacket may not boast the most original of themes, but it is exceedingly effective at communicating them.
